Name: Canaries
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple leaf or wedge.
Garnish with pineapple leaf or wedge.
Review: A long, fruity cocktail that's suited to a tropical beach.
Nutrition: One serving of Canaries contains 309 calories
